channel.title: Adding new Object problem
channel.description:
Hey there,
i am adding new objects and Npcs to my server now. the object code for bak booth for 317 servers is 2213, if i type it in it works, there appears a bank booth (::object 2213) but if i add it on my client file
//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType spawn = 2213 2842 3169 0 0 0 0 0 1 [ENDOFSPAWNLIST]
There appears a Draven Miner... lol :) I think theres something wrong with heright and rangex1 and rangey1 and so on, but wats the right code?

item.title: Adding new Object problem
item.dc:creator: @Saletana Saletana
item.description:
@Saletana wrote:

i searched in client and source folder, i searched in everything about the server, but it works now with the old code ive written. i added a banker npc now im gonna look if adding object will work too
ty

Read full topic

item.title: Adding new Object problem
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

[quote=“Saletana, post:8, topic:370503”]Cant find [quote]makeglobalobject[/quote] on client.java and not even on gui.java

Where can i find?[/quote]

it’s in the server not in the client folder. are you using delta?

Read full topic

item.title: Adding new Object problem
item.dc:creator: @Saletana Saletana
item.description:
@Saletana wrote:

[quote=“Ashton51, post:7, topic:370503”][quote author=Saletana link=topic=466606.msg3412426#msg3412426 date=1290804411]
Hey there,

i am adding new objects and Npcs to my server now.
the object code for bak booth for 317 servers is 2213, if i type it in it works, there appears a bank booth (::object 2213) but if i add it on my client file

//------[size=24pt]NpcID[/size]—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType
spawn = 2213 2842 3169 0 0 0 0 0 1
[ENDOFSPAWNLIST]

There appears a Draven Miner… lol I think theres something wrong with heright and rangex1 and rangey1 and so on, but wats the right code?
[/quote]

in client.java search for makeglobalobject
and add this in there

makeGlobalObject(2213, 2842, 3169, 0, 10);

Cant find

makeglobalobject
on client.java and not even on gui.java

Where can i find?

Read full topic

item.title: Adding new Object problem
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

[quote=“Saletana, post:1, topic:370503”]Hey there,

i am adding new objects and Npcs to my server now.
the object code for bak booth for 317 servers is 2213, if i type it in it works, there appears a bank booth (::object 2213) but if i add it on my client file

//------[size=24pt]NpcID[/size]—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType
spawn = 2213 2842 3169 0 0 0 0 0 1
[ENDOFSPAWNLIST]

There appears a Draven Miner… lol I think theres something wrong with heright and rangex1 and rangey1 and so on, but wats the right code?[/quote]

in client.java search for makeglobalobject
and add this in there

makeGlobalObject(2213, 2842, 3169, 0, 10);

Read full topic

item.title: Adding new Object problem
item.dc:creator: @mag3_0wner mag3 0wner
item.description:
@mag3_0wner wrote:

Thats for adding an npc… Not an object. If you want to add a new object you need to put this into client.java

	[code]makeGlobalObject(OBJECT ID, X-COORD, Y-COORD, HEIGHT, 10);[/code]

Or if your using PI it would look something like this - Put in objectmanager.java

	[code]c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(OBJ ID, X, Y, HEIGHT, 10);//gem stall[/code]

If you need help, i can help you via teamviewer just add me on msn - jakernub@hotmail.com

Read full topic
